雪山偈: (せっせんげ) - Himalayan verses (of the Nirvana Sutra)
雪山童子: (せっせんどうじ) - young ascetic of the Himalayas; one of the Buddha's past lives
雪崩れる: (なだれる) - to slope/to descend; (esp. 雪崩れる) to slide (snow, etc.)
雪崩れ込む: (なだれこむ) - to rush or crowd into; to surge into
雪崩を打つ: (なだれをうつ) - to surge like an avalanche; to flood; to swarm; to stampede
雪崩落ちる: (なだれおちる) - to slide down (snow, etc.)
雪平鍋: (ゆきひらなべ) - light-coloured ceramic cooking pan with a lid and short spout; (usu. 雪平鍋) aluminum saucepan with a handle (usu. wooden) and often with snowflake-style embossed pattern (aluminium)
雪形: (ゆきがた) - shape of the lingering snow on a mountainside
雪待ち月: (ゆきまちづき) - eleventh lunar month
雪待つ月: (ゆきまつつき) - eleventh lunar month
雪待月: (ゆきまつつき) - eleventh lunar month
雪折れ: (ゆきおれ) - breaking under the weight of snow
雪持: (ゆきもち) - having leaves and branches loaded with snow; snow guard (to prevent snow from sliding off of a roof)/snow stop
雪持ち: (ゆきもち) - having leaves and branches loaded with snow; snow guard (to prevent snow from sliding off of a roof)/snow stop
雪掻き: (ゆきかき) - snow shovel/snow plow/snow plough; snow shoveling (shovelling)/snow removal
雪支度: (ゆきじたく) - getting ready to go out in the snow; clothing for going out in the snow; snow gear
雪明かり: (ゆきあかり) - brightness of snow; reflected light of snow; (by) snow light
雪明り: (ゆきあかり) - brightness of snow; reflected light of snow; (by) snow light
雪晴れ: (ゆきばれ) - clear weather after snowfall
雪曇: (ゆきぐもり) - cloudy sky looking like it will snow soon
雪曇り: (ゆきぐもり) - cloudy sky looking like it will snow soon
雪月花: (せつげっか) - snow, moon, and flowers; beauty of the four seasons (from a poem by Bai Juyi)
雪柄: (ゆきがら) - snowflake pattern (esp. on winter clothing)
雪柳: (ゆきやなぎ) - Thunberg spirea; Spirea thunbergii
雪椿: (ユキツバキ) - snow camellia (Camellia japonica subsp. rusticana)
雪模様: (ゆきもよう) - weather portending snow; snowflake pattern
雪止: (ゆきどめ) - snow guard (to prevent snow from sliding off of a roof); snow stop
雪止め: (ゆきどめ) - snow guard (to prevent snow from sliding off of a roof); snow stop
雪水: (ゆきみず) - water from melted snow
雪氷: (ゆきこおり) - snow and ice; snow ice/frozen snow
雪沓: (ゆきぐつ) - snow boots or shoes
雪泥: (せつでい) - slush; slush ice; snow slush
雪洞: (ぼんぼり) - paper-covered lamp or lantern
雪消: (ゆきげ) - snow melting; water from melting snow
雪消え月: (ゆきぎえづき) - second lunar month
雪消月: (ゆきぎえづき) - second lunar month
雪深い: (ゆきぶかい) - snowy; covered in deep snow
雪焼け: (ゆきやけ) - being tanned by sunlight reflected from snow; snow-burn
雪白: (ゆきじろ) - snow white; refined sugar
雪笹: (ユキザサ) - Maianthemum japonicum (species of monocot)
雪肌: (ゆきはだ) - snow's surface; lily-white skin
雪腹: (ゆきばら) - back pain due to the cold accompanying a snowfall
雪膚: (ゆきはだ) - snow's surface; lily-white skin
雪舐: (ゆきねぶり) - snow remaining in the form of a mist after it has melted
雪舟の筆: (せっしゅうのふで) - work of Sesshu
雪花菜: (せっかさい) - residue left after making tofu; bean curd lees
雪茶: (ゆきちゃ) - Tibetan drink made from dried lichen
雪袴: (ゆきばかま) - work hakama for use in the snow
雪装束: (ゆきしょうぞく) - clothing for going out in the snow; snow gear
雪見灯籠: (ゆきみどうろう) - three-legged stone lantern
雪見酒: (ゆきみざけ) - sake drunk while viewing a snowy scene
雪見障子: (ゆきみしょうじ) - shoji with glass window behind a sliding bottom half
雪解: (ゆきげ) - snow melting; water from melting snow
雪豹: (ユキヒョウ) - snow leopard (Panthera uncia); ounce
雪起こし: (ゆきおこし) - thunder before a snowstorm
雪起し: (ゆきおこし) - thunder before a snowstorm
雪踏み: (ゆきふみ) - trampling down snow on a path; foot-worn instrument for trampling snow
雪転がし: (ゆきころがし) - game in which one makes a big snowball by rolling it around in the snow
雪辱: (setsujoku) - vindicação da honra, compensação pela perda, vingança
雪遊び: (ゆきあそび) - playing in the snow
